clinical_study.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics, Safety and Efficacy of HR020602 Injection in Children Undergoing General Anesthesia
clinical_study.official_title: Pharmacokinetics, Safety and Efficacy of HR020602 Injection in Children Undergoing General Anesthesia

brief_summary.textblock: This study is divided into two stages: the first stage is a dose verification trial, with a multicenter, open, single arm trial design, which is planned to enroll 10 children with general anesthesia surgery (all using HR020602 injection); the second stage is designed as a multicenter, randomized, double-blind, parallel control trial with positive drugs, which is planned to include 20 children with general anesthesia surgery in the test group and 20 children in the control group. There should be at least 15 patients in each of [2,12] and [12,18）age groups.
